comment: Turrets use volume as a measure of dispersion and recoil doesn't affect vehicles; so for the moment, I left those as zero.  This will change as soon as these issues are addressed.
name: NX-17 pulse turret
description: A powerful energy rifle, the addition of a capacitor allows the weapon to fire in controlled bursts.  The increased power requirements require a significant power source and the firing mechanism also requires a specialized chassis.  Comes with a motor and fire control system for autonomous operation.

name: tesla cannon turret
description: This alteration of the Chain Lightning bionic fires articial lightning bolts that arc to nearby enemies.  It must be attached to a large power source, but it allows for much more powerful bolts.  Comes with a motor and fire control system for autonomous operation.

name: laser cannon turret
description: This mounted laser may lack the damage capabilities of conventional heavy weapons, but it's a scientifically proven fact that traveling at the speed of light does wonders for one's overall deadliness.  The increased power requirements require a significant power source and the firing mechanism also requires a specialized chassis.  Comes with a motor and fire control system for autonomous operation.

name: turbolaser cannon turret
description: With an augmented emitter and capacitor, this mounted laser is capable of superheating most materials to the point of exploding.  The firing mechaniscm also requires the services of a specialized chassis, and one must be wary of the prodigious power needs of such a weapon.  Comes with a motor and fire control system for autonomous operation.

name: pulse laser turret
description: Although this laser weapon has rather low damage capability, it is capable of firing in rapid bursts.  The increased power requirements require a significant power source and the firing mechanism also requires a specialized chassis.  Comes with a motor and fire control system for autonomous operation.

name: needler turret
description: This improved nailgun features a special firing mechanism that is set to fire a spread of up to 5 nails at once; sure to drop the hammer on its unfortunate targets.  However, these features render it incredibly unwieldly, and it must be mounted on a turret chassis in order to be fired.  Comes with a motor and fire control system for autonomous operation.

name: 9mm SMG turret
description: A mounted submachine gun with an automated feeding, targeting, and firing system; fitted specifically for the standard 9mm caliber.  However, these additions render it incredibly unwieldly, requiring the services of a specialized turret chassis in order to be used.

name: .45 SMG turret
description: A mounted submachine gun with an automated feeding, targeting, and firing system; fitted specifically for the more powerful .45 caliber.  However, these additions render it incredibly unwieldly, requiring the services of a specialized turret chassis in order to be used.

name: .22 SMG turret
description: A mounted submachine gun with an automated feeding, targeting, and firing system; fitted specifically for the smaller .22 caliber.  However, these additions render it incredibly unwieldly, requiring the services of a specialized turret chassis in order to be used.

name: rifle turret
description: A .223 rifle with an automated feeding, targeting, and firing system.  It needs to be mounted on a turret chassis in order to be activated.

name: AP rifle turret
description: This reinforced turret frame mounts a powerful 50 caliber weapon.  Though capable of acquiring and tracking potential targets at long range; it will not exceed its range-limiter without external input.

name: scorpion turret
description: This massive crossbow is mounted on a rotating frame.  It's far too massive to be used on foot, and thus needs to be mounted on a vehicle turret chassis in order to be operated.  Comes with a motor and fire control system for autonomous operation.

name: rotary speargun turret
description: This mounted pneumatic speargun features a revolving barrel behind its launcher; an automated loading and targeting system allows for repeated volleys to be fired without an operator, but requires an external support measure.

name: slingshot cannon turret
description: Essentially several long drawstrings held by two long, reinforced rails and an automated mechanism attached to aim, draw, and fire it.  It's deceptively powerful and surprisingly accurate, but far too large to be used without some sort of stable platform.

name: avalanche turret
description: This pneumatic assault rifle has been greatly enhanced, firing projectiles faster and with higher velocity.  Once mounted on a frame, it is capable of acquiring targets and maintaining itself with little further input.  However, these features render it incredibly unwieldly, and it must be mounted on a turret chassis in order to be fired.

name: rotary cannon turret
description: This fearsome weapon sports 3 barrels in a cyclic configuration.  A specialized magazine loads the otherwise troublesome rounds; allowing it to be fired in quick succession.  However, these features render it incredibly unwieldly, and it must be mounted on a turret chassis in order to be fired.  Comes with a motor and fire control system for autonomous operation.

name: thundergun turret
description: Essentially an upsized shotgun, this explosive hazard will practically vaporize anything it's set against.  However, the limited range will also put its user at extreme risk if not managed correctly; but that's why you added a targeting system isn't it?.  You'll need some form of platform to mount this behemoth on.

name: shotgun turret
description: A mounted shotgun with an automated feeding, targeting, and firing system.  The targeting system has been programmed for quick acquisition of close targets in order to minimize spread and maximize damage.  It requires a turret mount in order to function.

name: M249 turret
description: An M249 with an automated feeding, targeting, and firing system.  The force generated by this weapon is significant enough to require an external frame.

name: M2 Browning turret
description: An M2 Browning Heavy Machine Gun with an automated feeding, targeting, and firing system.  The force generated by this weapon is significant enough to require an external frame.

name: RM298 turret
description: An RM298 Heavy Machine Gun with an automated feeding, targeting, and firing system.  The force generated by this weapon is significant enough to require an external frame.

name: grenade turret
description: A single-shot grenade launcher on a rotating frame, having a stable firing platform greatly increases accuracy and reduces recoil.  Comes with a motor and fire control system for autonomous operation.

name: storm bolter turret
description: This pneumatic bolt thrower has been greatly enhanced, allowing multiple bolts to be launched accurately and in quick succession.  It requires a specialized chassis in order to be operated.  Comes with a motor and fire control system for autonomous operation.

name: splintergun turret
description: A heavily modified coilgun that fires tiny fragments of metal at high speeds extremely quickly.  The resulting barrage is highly inaccurate, but can turn unarmored targets into pulp.  It must be mounted on a specialized chassis in order to be fired.  Comes with a motor and fire control system for autonomous operation.

name: perforator turret
description: A coilgun with improved electromagnetic circuits to be able to propel a metallic projectile at high speed and with great accuracy.  Capable of piercing armor with little issue, though the projectile itself lacks damage due to its small size.  It must be mounted on a specialized chassis in order to be fired.  Comes with a motor and fire control system for autonomous operation.

name: hypervelocity driver turret
description: A single-shot, electrically propelled, steel rail launcher mounted on a turret chassis.  The powerful, and frankly dangerous, improvements made to the power systems of this weapon is capable imbueing a massive charge into a single-rail; so much that it often shatters into deadly fragments on impact.  It's capabilities are limited by its prodigious power requirements however.  Comes with a motor and fire control system for autonomous operation.

name: flamethrower turret
description: This simple, home-made flamethrower has been made to be mounted on a vehicle.  Its fuel efficiency leaves a bit to be desired.  Comes with a motor and fire control system for autonomous operation.

name: flamecaster turret
description: This large flamethrower has been made to be mounted on a vehicle.  Comes with a motor and fire control system for autonomous operation.  Flame on!

name: dragon turret
description: This military-grade combat flamethrower has been made to be mounted on a vehicle.  Its pre-existing enhancements allow it to operate at maximum fuel efficiency, but still requires an external fuel source.  Comes with a motor and fire control system for autonomous operation.  Unleash the dragon!

name: ripper turret
description: This menacing weapon launches large, bladed disks that rips through enemies with devastating effect.  It requires a specialized chassis in order to function.  Comes with a motor and fire control system for autonomous operation.
